trans-unit.source: Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A printable machine learning algorithm cheat sheet helps you choose the right algorithm for your predictive model in Azure Machine Learning Studio.
trans-unit.target: A printable machine learning algorithm cheat sheet helps you choose the right algorithm for your predictive model in Azure Machine Learning Studio.

trans-unit.source: Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio
trans-unit.target: Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet helps you choose the right machine learning algorithm for your predictive analytics solutions from the Microsoft Azure Machine Learning library of algorithms.
trans-unit.target: The Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet helps you choose the right machine learning algorithm for your predictive analytics solutions from the Microsoft Azure Machine Learning library of algorithms.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure Machine Learning Studio</linkText><title></title></link> comes with a large number of machine learning algorithms for your predictive analytics solutions.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure Machine Learning Studio</linkText><title></title></link> comes with a large number of machine learning algorithms for your predictive analytics solutions.

trans-unit.source: These algorithms fall into the general machine learning categories of *regression*, *classification*, *clustering*, and *anomaly detection*, and each one is designed to address a different type of machine learning problem.
trans-unit.target: These algorithms fall into the general machine learning categories of *regression*, *classification*, *clustering*, and *anomaly detection*, and each one is designed to address a different type of machine learning problem.

trans-unit.source: See the article <link><linkText>How to choose algorithms for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title></link> for a detailed guide to using this cheat sheet.
trans-unit.target: See the article <link><linkText>How to choose algorithms for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title></link> for a detailed guide to using this cheat sheet.

trans-unit.source: Download the machine learning algorithm cheat sheet
trans-unit.target: Download the machine learning algorithm cheat sheet

trans-unit.source: Download the Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet and get help figuring out how to choose a machine learning algorithm for your solution.
trans-unit.target: Download the Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet and get help figuring out how to choose a machine learning algorithm for your solution.

trans-unit.source: To keep it nearby, you can print the cheat sheet in tabloid size (11 x 17 in.).
trans-unit.target: To keep it nearby, you can print the cheat sheet in tabloid size (11 x 17 in.).

trans-unit.source: **Download the cheat sheet here: <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet</linkText><title></title></link>**
trans-unit.target: **Download the cheat sheet here: <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet</linkText><title></title></link>**

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Machine Learning Algorithm cheat sheet: Learn how to choose a Machine Learning algorithm.</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Machine Learning Algorithm cheat sheet: Learn how to choose a Machine Learning algorithm.</linkText>

trans-unit.source: For a deeper discussion of the different types of machine learning algorithms, how they're used, and how to use this cheat sheet for choosing the right algorithm, see <link><linkText>How to choose algorithms for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For a deeper discussion of the different types of machine learning algorithms, how they're used, and how to use this cheat sheet for choosing the right algorithm, see <link><linkText>How to choose algorithms for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For a list by category of all the machine learning algorithms available in Machine Learning Studio, see <link><linkText>Initialize Model[initialize-model]</linkText><title></title></link> in the Machine Learning Studio Algorithm and Module Help.
trans-unit.target: For a list by category of all the machine learning algorithms available in Machine Learning Studio, see <link><linkText>Initialize Model[initialize-model]</linkText><title></title></link> in the Machine Learning Studio Algorithm and Module Help.

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of algorithms and modules in Machine Learning Studio, see <link><linkText>A-Z list of Machine Learning Studio modules[a-z-list]</linkText><title></title></link> in Machine Learning Studio Algorithm and Module Help.
trans-unit.target: For a complete list of algorithms and modules in Machine Learning Studio, see <link><linkText>A-Z list of Machine Learning Studio modules[a-z-list]</linkText><title></title></link> in Machine Learning Studio Algorithm and Module Help.
